name: more-languages-for-adobe-brackets
title: More Languages for Adobe Brackets
description: A plugin to extend code and markup language support in Adobe Brackets using the native CodeMirror. This plugin currently supports code/markup highlights for Brainfuck, COBOL, Common Lisp, Cython, D, Fortran, IDL, LaTeX, Mathematica, Pascal, PowerShell, reStructuredText (RST/reST), sTeX, and Swift.
author: Erick Shepherd (http://github.com/ErickShepherd)
